Name: Desktop AI - Lily
About the game: Playing games and working on your computer, Desktop AI next to you! You can display characters on your desktop. Enjoy a conversation with Lily! Even if this is a desktop mascot, it will give you peace of mind. The desktop is not lonely. Lily is warmly waiting for you. ・ Enter the text and it will respond. ・ She name is Lily, please be kind. ・ Is it difficult to find it? It's okay, you can hide it immediately with the x button on the upper left ・ maybe when you connect the microphone and talk... ・ You can move it with the mouse, it's easy! ・ There is also a shooting game where you click the crystal. Aim, high score ・ The high score of the creator is 1700 (This character is just AI. Please do not excessive expectations.) Speech recognition time: 100 minutes
